title: The Dread Isle
opening: Eliwood arrives on the shores of Valor with a new companion in his numbers, an enigmatic young girl named Ninian. The majority of the island is covered in dense forest. Legend has it that no one has ever returned from those dark woods. A dense fog crawls over the party, engulfing them one by one... Cautiously, they move deeper into the trees.

Hector arrives on the shores of Valor with a new companion in his numbers, an enigmatic young girl named Ninian. The majority of the island is covered in dense forest. Legend has it that no one has ever returned from those dark woods. A dense fog crawls over the party, engulfing them one by one… Cautiously, they move deeper into the trees.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Shame on you, Marquess Pherae. You freed the boy AND the girl?

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: I will not let you move unopposed!

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Wh-What shall we do, Lord Nergal? With both siblings gone, we can no longer hold the ceremony.

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: How many times must I tell you, Lord Darin? You are being used by this man!! By helping him bring dragons back into this world, you are helping him destroy mankind! Do you understand?!?

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Pah...ha ha ha... Destroy mankind? Dragons may have been a threat to mankind in ages past, but with Lord Nergal's power, we've got nothing to fear! Lord Nergal can control dragons!!! Ha ha...ha ha ha...

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Lord Darin.... You're already lost.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: I'd planned to start a war in Lycia. The war I was plotting in Lycia would've generated a glorious amount of FORCE in one blow. You were not equal to the task, it seems. Not to worry, I've other means at hand.

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Black-hearted fiend! Guuuh!!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Hold your tongue. There is still a task you must perform for me. Ephidel! Limstella!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: My beloved morphs, my beauteous works of art. I've new jobs for you, my pets. First, Limstella. You will go to Bern and contact Sonia. I want you to arrange a meeting with the king.

intro.speaker: Limstella
intro.line: Understood.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Ephidel, take this... man, Marquess Laus, and go. I want you to exterminate the mice who've landed on the island.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Yes, master.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: That leaves you, Marquess Pherae. It seems your legacy is one of endurance.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: ...The mouse who interfered with my conquest of Lycia is named Eliwood. Should he be congratulated on making it this far?

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Eliwood? My son is here? Stop! Do with me what you will, but let my son be!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Hm? Heh... Hehahahaha!!! Remember the siblings you freed? The girl's here, too. As a matter of fact, she's with your son, Eliwood. Quite a delicious twist of fate, wouldn't you say?

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: ....This can't be...

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Eliwood will die in these woods. The girl will be returned to me, and the ceremony will take place. Hm... Despite those long hours of torture, you remain undaunted. Such courage will make you the perfect sacrifice, Marquess Pherae.

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Eliwood... Turn back... Take the girl and flee...... Please.........

intro.speaker: Leila
intro.line: I can't believe it's come to this. I must inform Lord Hector of these events... If I hurry, I may be in time. What!?

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Leila... Where are you going?

intro.speaker: Leila
intro.line: Lord Ephidel... The sentries... I'm going to check on...

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: You overheard, did you not? ...And I had such hopes for you. Jaffar!

intro.speaker: Leila
intro.line: Ah!!

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: The punishment for traitors is death.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: ....Impressive, Jaffar. Your power is beyond compare.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Take this woman's corpse and leave it in the forest. Let it serve as a warning to those fools.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Let's get through these woods. It's starting to get foggy... Try not to get separated.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: "Enter and be lost." It feels like we're not coming back.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Hector!! Are you trying to curse us?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Are you well, Ninian?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ....Y-Yes... I'm.... I'll be fine.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: !? Someone's there!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Who? A sentry?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Leila! Is that you? Impressive work, finding your way here!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...Something's wrong. Leila?  Lei--!!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: She's...dead...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: No!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: ...This can't be. She was one of our best spies. Leila....

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: ...I'm sorry, Matthew.

intro.speaker: Matthew
intro.line: ...Why do you apologize, my lord? Leila blundered. ....That's all.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Matthew... Leila was... She was...

intro.speaker: Matthew
intro.line: After this mission, I was going to ask her to put this life behind her... Waited too long, didn't I? Ha..... .....My lord, might I...rejoin you later? She has to be buried...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: ...Of course.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Ah... I'll go with you...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...Let them be alone. There's nothing else we can do....

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Blast! They put her out here for us to find like this!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Unforgivable! This is... a foul deed. Beyond foul.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: .....Let's go! The foe is somewhere in this forest. We must stop this before any more die!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Ah! ....Beware! Something comes!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: What?  Kyaa!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Lyndis!!

intro.speaker: Uhai
intro.line: ...If you value her life, send the girl to me.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: You, you're Sacaen!

intro.speaker: Uhai
intro.line: That's correct... I am Uhai of the Black Fang. I've been sent to capture the girl... And to kill the lot of you. If, however... you hand over the girl and depart the island at once, I'll grant you your lives.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: And if we refuse?

intro.speaker: Uhai
intro.line: You know nothing, little lord. Nothing of Nergal's might. Nothing of his terrible power. You are ignorant, and so you hope to oppose him. You are insects railing against the heavens. Your actions will change nothing. Speak no more foolishness and begone!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...Maybe we don't know what it is we're fighting... But if we flee, our loss is assured. So we will continue to struggle, and we may yet prevail!

intro.speaker: Uhai
intro.line: ...Folly.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: What?!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Why are you letting me go? Holding a woman hostage during battle is shameful. You, too, are of Sacae, and I've a mind to show you mercy. I will let you die with a sword in your hands. But rest assured... I will kill you all here. But be of good cheer! In dying, you shall all be spared the calamity that is to come!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Ninian, you must hide. We will meet the enemy!

battle.speaker: Dart
battle.line: You're Mark, right? I'm Dart, leader of Fargus's suicide squad! The captain's ordered me to follow your commands. So, who do you want me to take care of?

battle.speaker: Rebecca
battle.line: Um, Mark. Can I ask you something? Do you think Dart and I...have anything in common? What? Not at all? Hmmm... I don't know, there's something about him.

recruit-talk.speaker: Florina
recruit-talk.line: I’m here with Lady Lyndis. What are you doing here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Fiora
recruit-talk.line: ...I was investigating the Dread Isle for someone.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fiora
recruit-talk.line: No... There were others...a full unit of pegasus knights. We were attacked...

recruit-talk.speaker: Fiora
recruit-talk.line: I misjudged our sitatuon. ...All of my knights are dead because of me... I’m a failure.

recruit-talk.speaker: Florina
recruit-talk.line: That’s not true! You’re a splendid pegasus knight! I chose this path because I admired you so! Please...don’t do this to yourself!

recruit-talk.speaker: Fiora
recruit-talk.line: No, it’s my fault. The pain of being the sole survivor... It had me trapped. ...Thank you, Florina. I can see clearly now.

recruit-talk.speaker: Florina
recruit-talk.line: ...Fiora! Come and travel with us! It’s better to travel with friends than to struggle alone.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fiora
recruit-talk.line: ...You’re right. I hate to admit it, but I can’t do everything alone. Nor can I render my companions’ sacrifices moot by going home. Florina, please introduce me to your commander. I’ll see if I can offer my services for a short while.

boss.speaker: Uhai
boss.line: I am Uhai! I am the Soaring Hawk! Come!

boss.speaker: Uhai
boss.line: Guuu... Well...done...... You are... stronger... stronger than I expected. Out of respect... ...a final gift from me... From here, go south. ...Turn at the rotted tree. Head...west. There lies the path to the... ...Dragon’s Gate... Unnh...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Uhai... I wish we could've met under different circumstances.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: He was a Sacaen. He would not lie. ...I, at least, choose to believe him.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I don’t think he was behind Leila’s death. Black Fang! I don’t know who’s responsible, so I’m going to destroy you all!!
